name: Bob Frick
text:
Totally SHOCKED !!
Took my tanks in to have refilled, which where filled two months earlier else where. Get to the back to fill the worker comes out we talk, then I’m told my tank is too old to fill, oh ok now he is checking the other tank. It’s is out of date too . Well of course I inquire about how to tell. Then he tells me how you can be harmed horribly by filling an out of date tank. Says I should be a new tank come with me I’ll show you some. Then tells me how the state test them by getting them to fill bad tanks and more Regulation talk. THEN HE SAYS I WOULD FILL THE TANKS IF I KNEW YOU .
WHAT I ASKED DID YOU SAY ? Did you say if you knew me you would fill them? He said yes.
WHAT IN THE WORLD IS GOING ON HERE?? I left THAT IS VERY DANGEROUS!!!! NEVER AGAIN WILL I USE THIS PLACE. TOTALLY UNSAFE SHOULD BE SHUT DOWN!!!
Fill out of date tanks if they know you.REALLY.

name: Rick Thompson
text:
1 star for being a bunch of time wasters. We were loyal customers for 3 years. We moved houses and asked for them to come out and fill our tank in the new house.

Monday-- Dispatch said they will put us in the system and will be onsite next day.
Tuesday-- No show. Called dispatch and they assured us we where in the "system" and will be out next day.
Wednesday -- No show. Called again and told us we were not in the "system". Scheduled us for next day.
Thursday -- No show. They told us once more that they will come tomorrow. After hearing that a 4th time we decided to cancel.

@ThompsonGas Whatever "system" you are using will undoubtedly lose more customers.  Be honest when building expectations. It would have been totally fine if you said "we'll be there on Friday." But instead I was told "tomorrow" each time. So I stayed home when I could have been in the office. Get your shjt together, be professionals,  and stop leading people on.

name: Ailee Hood
text: Very helpful customer service i.e. how to get an account and service set up, and yes they take care of you way out in the country!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing!

name: Barbara Evans
text: Good service. Caring people.

name: Sharon DeFee
text: Office personnel are so lacking they can't find your bill by name or address. Maybe I'll just change to ACME.

name: Melissa Hearon
text: I want to start off by saying I usually love Holston Gases I buy all my welding supply and propane from them. For the most part they have a very good staff.  I was very disappointed with them this morning when I called at 7 a.m. to get some propane delivery before the storm. I was told they was closed because the weather coming in and my name would be added to a list for delivery when they reopen.

name: Nora Anderson
text: We had one of the worst experiences ever with a propane company.  The guy at the desk did not want to fill our tank on on motorhome, when he said he would I understand why he did not want to do it he had no ideal how to fill a tank.  He freaked out and told us there was something wrong, well that is the overfill valve, he didn't know what that was!!  Then he wanted to charge us 2X's what we were quoted, lucky for us the person who stated our original price was there and he had to charge us what was quoted.  I suggest do not let that man ever fill anything!!   Will never go to them again.

name: Thomas Ostrander
text:
In addition to the various industrial gasses they supply. They also have a very nice selection of welding supplies. Everything from flints, to coats, to multi-thousand dollar welders.
As a welding student at Calhoun Community College I really appreciate that the staff know exactly what you're looking for, even if you don't, and will have it for you in seconds. They also have never tried to upsell me on anything or batted an eyelash at me walking in and only buying a $16 pair of gloves.

name: Jim Macaulay
text: Staff is always helpful one of the best places to get welding supplies

resp.text: Thank you Jim! We are always happy to help!

name: Todd Bohn
text: Very well run organization. Also, if you are a welding student,  you get a discount.  Check with them on this for the details.

name: Stuart
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable staff, I always come here to get all my food grade co2 beverage and gas needs.

name: Joe Brewer
text: Refuses to refill bottles the sold me a few years ago. I doubt I will be back.

name: Ted Sheckler
text: Outstanding customer service! Everyone there is professional and courteous! Highly recommend!!

name: Mick Lindley
text: Called at 9am to ask if they could fill my propane tank on my RV. They stated no one was there to do it. Don't waste your time. Look elsewhere.

name: Jason Etheridge
text: Exchanged lp tanks. 1 st one leaked immediately. They exchanged for another. Camped the weekend, turned off valves to return a month later to an empty tank. For something as dangerous as gas.... leak test should be a priority. Money wasted.

name: Tammi East
text: I have tried for three days to cancel a delivery. Sent three emails and put on hold for over two and a half hours. This company has the absolute worst customer service I have ever dealt with! I will never use them again!

name: Diggin Dawn
text: I looked at the reviews and did not see any negatives. Strange...Well, you have one now! My Sister paid for her propane 2 days ago and I just found out she ran out today because y'all couldn't deliver to her because an employee didn't work today  Does anyone there keep up with the weather? It is 15 degrees with a CF of 12 degrees! Not only is she freezing to death, she is also worried that her pipes will freeze and burst. Somebody at Heritage Propane should have cared enough to make sure her propane was delivered even if they had to work overtime to do it due to the weather. And once y'all even sent her a bill for 1 penny. Is your company really that hard up for money? Rest assured I will be looking for a dependable propane service for her to sign up with.  I gave Heritage Propane 1 star only because I couldn't post without it!

name: Cynthia Morgan
text: My sister in law lives in Gaylesville Alabama, she paid in full for a 100 gallons on Monday 01/15/2018 its freezing with snow on the ground and ice on the roads and is out of heat!! This is a disgrace, they say an employee stayed out of work, fine this is your company and your responsibility to the people you serve. You took funds that guarantee that your customer will be warm, you have failed in this agreement. I hope she and her pets do not freeze to death, yes i offered food and shelter but she can not get to my home. I don't care what this company has to do but you should have had a driver (in a warm truck) deliver . today is Wednesday it was ordered 2 days ago. I will be reporting this further, that you can count on!!!

name: Sally Lee
text: This is the WORST company ever.  We just moved into a house and we called around Sept. For delivery and to check. Well, they were backed up. We called and called and she told us that their guys was working on Saturday because they were behind. Finally, two months later When it was COLD they finally come to inspect and check out everything. The short heavy man and tall skinny man arrived RUDE  towards me. Funny how I woke my husband up and told them how they were being an he walked in and  they were nice as can be the whole time. Then later we went to order more gas and paid upfront and got a bill, like really????????? will never use them and tell everyone!!!! When the heavy short man, tall skinny man hateful to a woman but different when a woman is around is pathetic!!!!

name: Justin Busby
text: Worked here from 2011 to 2014 and I still have to say iv never lerned so much so quick anywhere else,  had many many great times. Awesome company! !!!!

name: Troy Patterson
text: Website says open until 5 4:20 & their closed.

name: Mark Cook
text: These people are awful!!  Service is awful, emoyees are discourtious, equipment is not maintained and they try not to refund money they overcharge you.   Find another source, this business is obviously in deep trouble and the lack of maintenance on the rental equipment is going to cause someone serious problems.

name: Jeremy Hughes
text:
Worst experience I have ever had at a rental place . We reserved a 20 ft truck 2 weeks in advance to move my daughter to North Carolina for medical school .
I was quoted $395.00 total for the weekend to return it sunday . I show up to pick the truck up at 6 pm on friday and the tell me it's going to be $1236.00 . They said the lady that made my reservation messed up , so I didnt have the money to get it and it was too late to go somewhere else , so it ruined our plans and our schedule . I will never go back here ever and you cant get ahold of anybody to complain .

name: Nilesha Givens
text: The Manger Antonio is the exact opposite of what the sales department displays the mission and goals the Sales Department portray when renting any service from this unit.   Last year when I rented a truck and unit online the sales department split the sale; I pick up the truck from 1420 Montgomery Hwy facility and the unit sold to me was this facility.  After, moving my son home from Alabama State University, tired and weary, I decided to go to the unit first to unload his items from college.  It was so many people there and every time a customer complained (People of color) the employees would say, “He is not available.”  Looking out of the window I noticed a white man running up to the U-Haul vehicle we rented from a half a mile away approach my son sitting in the U-Haul Van yelling, screaming at him, "Is that my truck?”  I got out of the long line and approach the man and asked him why he was screaming at my son (It was Antonio the manger) and he said, I am the manger looking for one of my vehicles.  Meanwhile a neighbor of mine was moving and demanding to speak with because the U-Haul she rented broke down on the side of the road after leaving the facility and she was told he was unavailable; she was black too.  Antonio put a lock on my storage never notifying me because he said it was the wrong lock and I purchased it from his facility.  I do not have key, nor have he reached out to me.  Calls to the facility always goes into the sales department because the staff is always unavailable.  People of color never rent anything from this facility that is why his employee turn over rate is so high!

name: betty webb
text: Wish I could have stored my things at this one so nice and professional....😳🥺but had to use the other one across from the bowling alley. Not professional at all.

name: Christian Hunter
text: Best moving services!!! If you are looking for affordable moving services then go for U-Haul Moving & Storage of Vestavia.

name: Jose Conchello
text: Called a few weeks ahead to get a wiring harness installed.  Arrived at my appointment time only to find out that they don't have mechanics scheduled to come in for another 2 hours. You would think that a nation-wide enterprise would have figure out how a scheduling system works by this day in age. Serious waste of my personal time due to company negligence.

name: Drew Templeton
text: Joshua was a huge help. The rental process was smooth and I ended up being really glad I got the $8 insurance add-on 😬😅. Will definitely be back.

name: Eric Bowden
text: This location excels in customer service and should be a model for all U-HAUL locations. Being in the customer service industry myself, I know first hand what excellent customer service should look like. Every single person at this location work in excellence every day. GREAT JOB!  We appreciate you and we will definitely be back!!

name: Chris Williams
text: Can’t even bother to answer their phone. I was on hold for an hour and no answer. Yes it was during business hours. Pitiful service. Won’t be using y’all

name: Katherine Barhydt
text: We specifically ordered a 15ft truck over 3 weeks in advance and they tried to “upgrade” us to a 26ft. Neither of us have ever driven something that size and made it clear we were extremely uncomfortable especially driving that size in downtown Houston traffic. How do you consider that an upgrade? If I ordered a Medium sweater and got a XXL it would be reasonable to be upset. No one would help us, they let other people in line behind us interrupt while we were trying to sort the mess they made out. We called 5 times over Friday and Saturday to confirm our truck and it’s size. I could not be more disappointed in their customer service, the ethics of this company, and their willingness to honor the contracts they make with their customers.

name: T. Lee Baumann
text: I can see why this establishment is not listed on Angie's List, HomeAdvisors, or has a Better Business Bureau affiliation. After driving in from out of town to get a hitch installed on my car, and having confirmed that the parts were in, several days in advance, when I arrived for my reservation, I was told the parts were NOT in! When asked how that could be, after verifying the parts several days beforehand, I was told their employees were trained to say "yes." My biggest disappointment was the absence of any apologies whatsoever. I was then promised I would be contacted AS SOON as the parts did arrive. That never happened. I had to call the corporate office the day before my rescheduled reservation (on a holiday weekend, of course) to finally verify that the parts had arrived. This is the type of service you should expect should you choose to do business at this location.

name: Dan Little
text: Good service, clean and convenient

name: Chuck Turner
text:
Had a great experience
Eric white is a great asset to uhaul.  Great skill sets and very thorough in the transaction

name: nick
text: Been in store twice and had no one at counter for several mins both times. If u need free stuff you most likely could go in and out without ever being noticed

name: Chato Denaris
text: .today after a 20  mile detour the two young punks , feed me a " my manager line " because it was to hard for them to open a gas line .pitiful😡

name: Kevin Morson
text: U-Haul on 31 has the worst customer service I've ever experienced. I walk into the store and can't find anybody. So I walk around back to see if I can find someone. When I finally do I say "oh good there is someone here, I need to get a propane tank filled". He jumps down my throat and tells me "they're busy hooking up trailers". I say "there's no need to be rude", afterward he turns and walks away from me. This is not the first time I've had issue with U-Haul but it will be the last I'm done with them.

name: Justin Rogers
text: Nice facility and quick service. It's best if you call ahead to make sure that the size truck you want is there for you. Also, make sure you know the relative distance you are traveling, and save your receipt from when you fill up just in case there are any problems.

name: Sandra Cox
text: The assistant manager was so helpful. I was running late and he waited for me to get propane. He went above and beyond and I am very grateful.

name: Jonathan Ary
text:
I would not recommend  this Uhaul location to anyone for anything.  I detailed my experience with them below.....

2015:  I took my vehicle to them to have a trailer hitch installed.  I scheduled an appointment and dropped my vehicle off at 7:00 am on my way to work and was assured that it would be completed by 4:00 pm when I came back.  It was almost 7:00 pm before they were complete, so I sat there for 3 hours waiting.  When they were complete they told me that I would need to come back and get a ball for the hitch since they didn't have an that fit the hitch in stock.  This defeated the purpose of needing a hitch before the weekend, but I borrowed a ball from a neighbor.  When I hooked the trailer up, I noticed the lights were not coming on. Something was wrong with the electrical.

3 days later I called and they said to come in and pick up the ball.  When I arrived they said that they were mistaken and did not have one.  I mentioned that the electrical was faulty, but they could not look at it that day since the trailer hitch guy was not there.

1 month later I called(they never called me back) and was told they had a ball that fit and I picked it up.  Once again, they said no one was there to look at my electrical issue.

A few months later I called to make an appointment to have the hitch fixed.  Their phone disconnected me three times and I gave up after wasting 30 minutes on hold.

When I go by the location and finally make an appointment, i'm told it will cost me upwards of $100 to have it repaired since it only had a 30 day warranty.  They said there was no record of me having ever mentioned the issue before.

Overall, this location has awful customer service.  More should have been done to fix my issues instead of kicking the can down the road until they could say it was out of warranty.

name: Y S
text:
How do they hire people with such bad customer service. The two guys working there on Sunday afternoon both times I have gone (back in December) and then today) make up whatever excuse and have the ugliest attitude. Give them some lessons on body language and customer service.

Please avoid this location at all cost! Go to Pelham, super friendly and helpful there.

name: VERONICA ROSAS
text: Exelente service Mr. Antonio always take care me with everything I need I come to that place 1 time a week to tent a truck or refill my propane tank

name: helishengduowen
text: Antonio is the best moving planner you can get, and the even better part is he doesn't charge!

name: JK Dufour
text:
I got a wiring done for a trailer hitch and it took them over 3 hours to install. In the process of the installation they broke my brake light wiring and failed to say anything to me after, then when I was pulled over I came back and asked them about it, they denied having broken it and said it was there before. I asked them to fix it and it took them 2 hours to even start on it and after 3 total hours they said they can’t find anything wrong and they tried to charge me for labor.
They also overcharged me for a 5x8 trailer that I brought back a day early.
This place has some of the most incompetent customer service of any U-haul.

name: J T
text: Not a bad experience but the wait can be long. Check in ahead of time online, it makes a huge difference. The staff was fast and friendly once I got moving. I would use this location again.

name: Evan Harsh
text:
Do not believe anything they quote you over the phone. Sounds like the employees are just guessing.

I spoke to the GM Anthonio C. and only got excuses. No apologies were given and no amends for the hassle I was put through were offered. The only thing he was willing to do was refund me for an appliance dolly that was not given to me.

Unless there's no other option I will never use Uhaul again.

Zero customer service skills across the board.

name: Tiffany Chapman
text: I have some questions about something and the young guy there was very nice and he was very informative and he gave me printouts of prices of the item I needed and the staff was overall

name: Payton Sellers
text: By far and away the worst interaction with any business I have ever had (comcast and other communications providers included). I experienced double billings, over billings, misrepresentation, late services, failure to come through on services offered. Surely, uhaul must be a capable organization, however the people within this store simply misrepresent their capabilities as to when services will be available, times they will be available, etc. I arrived at the store after calling 3 times (once the day prior and twice earlier that day) to verify that the services I needed were ready - and they were not, an no one seemed to care. the My issue was escalated to the regional manager and even he failed to call return my call. Don't take this risk with people who will be storing and moving your things. Avoid at all costs :(

name: Josh May
text:
Edit: My review below was based on my last 4 or 5 visits and still stands. While it took me another 2 visits and 15-20 minutes of wait time today to get my tank filled, the associate did recognize the situation and gave me a discount on the propane. Bumping from 1 to 2 stars.

Getting propane here is like pulling teeth. You can ring the bell all you want, but you just get ignored. Associates walk past and don't say anything. Going inside and asking just nets you excuses ("broken machine", "don't have anyone who can do that right now", etc.). I get that the trucks are the money makers, but if you offer a service, have a plan for it. Set specific propane hours, train your maintenance crews on how to use the machine, or something else.

name: Cody Hamilton
text: UHual and Walmart have equivalent customer service and that’s why I don’t shop at Walmart and I just bought my own trailer so I don’t have to deal with either now.

name: Little Bird
text: Booked reservation for 6x12 trailer several weeks out. Had "Guaranteed Reservation". Checked inventory on site, looked good. Day before moving daughter to college at 4:09 PM, receive text my reservation has been moved to Location 30+ miles away.  Called location where I had reservation and was told, "It's corporate. I can't do anything about it. You need to call 800-GOUHAUL if you're not happy."  Called 800# multiple times on the way to Vestavia location alternating calls to Pell City as I was afraid of driving 31 miles without assurance of equipment.  No answer in Pell City. 800 number would pick up and then drop me over and over. At store, no help. In front of me for 30 minutes, people with same story. Behind me...a dozen more people with same story as me. At counter poor kid making apologies and telling how bad U-Haul has become. Don't use U-Haul unless you're willing to gamble on your move day. I would give them no stars if it would let me. Expect to see them folding up shop any day now. No way a corporation can operate this way.

name: Kristen
text: Some if the workers could be a bit nicer but they had what we needed.

name: Rus Hardy
text: Read your paperwork closely!  What they quote isn't what you get.

name: Ashlee Boren Myers
text: After our pick up time was pushed back from 12 to 3pm, we were told they had no truck there for us. Despite the fact I had called to confirm. We were then redirected to the store on Valley avenue. The man at the desk seemed more irritated with the situation than I was and did not apologize once for the situation.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Convenient trailer rentals with wide selection

name: Eric
text: Always rent from these guys when I need a basic trailer.... never had a problem.

name: Joseph Duran
text: Friendly and quick, that's all I need any place to be.

name: Joseph Williams
text: A hole in the roof of the truck was hidden by the open rear door. Found the hole when we were loading the truck and notified the General Manager and he stuck me with the bill for repair because as he repeatedly stated insistently: "We do not ship trucks with holes". Despite the hole being obviously either cutout or rusted out due to poor maintenance/inspections and in a location that is impossible to see unless the door is almost completely lowered or the door is closed with someone inside. 0/10 Experience and will not be using UHAUL again especially the UHAUL in Vestavia.

name: walt stricklin
text: good people, great experience every time I use this location!!

name: Andrew Parrott
text: Great service, willing to work with all moving needs.

name: Nikkia Smith
text: In and out with great customer service! My new uhaul home!

name: Chris Freeman
text: Convenient location, but they're way too busy for the amount of staff they have.  Expect long waits

name: Christopher Peters
text: Friendly staff, made renting the truck easy.

name: alston1028
text: I've always had a good experience there, from getting propane to renting a trailer.

name: Daniel Seay
text: Decent. A bit of a wait during visit due to lack of staff.

name: J Ranieri
text: Slow service. Not sure if it is the technology or the people.

name: Amreen Ali
text: Very good store.

name: Tom Millard
text: Huge selection of trucks, trailers, etc. Waits can be bad though.

name: Kristi Martin
text: Managers are helpful and awesome.

name: Brian Cupps
text: 20 minute wait and my reservation wasn't available.

name: Matthew Montz
text: Went for propane.  Waited outside 20 minutes and left empty.  Obviously selling propane is not much of a priority here.

name: John Robertson
text: Service ok

name: Daniel Crosby
text: Done with U-Haul

name: Jeannie Johnson
text: Friendly

name: Lacy Farms
text: This is a very nice Welding Supply house. They have the best showroom.

name: Jennifer uabmc
text: Nobody inside the building wearing masks, or bothered to put one on when I walked in today. Gross that they can’t even pretend to care about customer health and safety for 1 minute. A group of guys just standing in a circle behind the counter chatting away.

resp.text: We appreciate your taking time to review our company. Customer safety is and remains a priority.  This morning, we included your comment in our morning safety meeting.  Should you wish to talk more about this or have concerns in the future, please contact Kevin, the local branch manager, at (205) 841-0713

name: Benjamin Keith
text: Great place to meet All of your welding and relavent gas needs. They're so good at what they do, even their competitors secretly buy supplies from them. Hands-down the Best in the Business!

name: Joshua Parris
text: Quick service, super friendly and very knowledgeable staff. I'd definitely recommend them over the other welding supply stores in town.

name: leo harrell
text: They are very good at helping you find what you need if they don't sale it they would point you in the right direction

name: Matt Shabani
text: The best in the game!  Airgas who???? Nexair who??? Never heard of them!

name: Derrick Winfrey
text: Will drive past a airgas every time to come here, fast, friendly, and much better selection for real craftsmen that want the best

name: Deane Salyers
text: They have everything you need for your job needs.

name: Lamar Wright
text: Prompt service and all completed on line.

resp.text: Hi Lamar Wright, First thank you for being an Amerigas customer! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us feedback.

name: David Watkins
text: I hate everything on a computer. You need a person to talk to sometime at a local office not someone hundreds of thousands miles away.

resp.text: We understand you are frustrated by the experience of trying to contact us. We apologize for the issues you have experienced lately and recognize we have not provided you with the service you expect as our customer. Over the past year, we’ve transformed our customer service model with upgraded technology and centralized our customer care team. The goal is to make ordering easier and enhance our customer service, while freeing up the teams at our local offices to focus on delivery and service. These new processes have caused some issues, but we are working hard to make everything run smoothly again! We would like to request that you send a private email to us with a little more information, at AmerigasGMB@amerigas.com, so we can escalate this to our customer care team. We respectfully ask that you email the below information to amerigasGMB@amerigas.com and our customer service team will reach out to you directly. - First Name, Last Name on AmeriGas Account - AmeriGas Account Number - Contact Information (Email and Phone Number) - How we can help you - What days/times are best to contact you - Thank you!

name: Steven Webb
text:
These people have the WORST customer
service in the entire industry! I have had a credit of over $300 that they are supposed to be sending me. I have been waiting on that check in the mail for over 7 weeks. When I order gas, I have to pay for it before they will deliver. . . Hello! I have a $300 credit showing on my account. They told me 7 weeks ago that they would mail me my credit . . .still waiting. THEN, when you call them you’re told you have a 90 minute wait time. These people need to reorganize or they are gonna be out of business. I’m looking for a better provider I can promise you this much! This is inexcusable and unacceptable in today’s customer service!

name: Samuel Thompson
text: This location does not service "walk-in" customers (June 2021). Ended up swapping for a full propane tank at Home Depot after wasting a trip to this location. Thanks, Google for telling me it's "open" until 4:30pm. Only open if I was a driver of an AmeriGas tank delivery truck.

resp.text: Samuel Thompson, we are so sorry to hear this – but we are listening. We appreciate you bringing this matter to our attention. We apologize for the issues you have experienced lately and recognize we have not provided you with the service you expect as our customer. Over the past year, we’ve transformed our customer service model with upgraded technology and centralized our customer care team. The goal is to make ordering easier and enhance our customer service, while freeing up the teams at our local offices to focus on delivery and service. The evolution didn’t go as smoothly as we’d hoped, but we are actively working to make this better and provide you with the customer care you expect. We would like to request a little more of your information, so we can escalate this to our customer care team. We respectfully ask that you email the below information to amerigasGMB@amerigas.com and our customer service team will reach out to you directly. - First Name, Last Name on AmeriGas Account - AmeriGas Account Number - Contact Information (Email and Phone Number) - How we can help you - What days/times are best to contact you - Thank you!

name: Dina Jaime
text: We have been with Amerigas for over 5yrs without any issue until this month. Scheduled my delivery on Dec 21 over two weeks later, here we are with the temperature in lows 40s during the day and an empty tank to heat water and a freezing cold home. everytime I call it takes more than 20 mins for someone to pick up the call, if I'm lucky to get someone on the other end of the line or I just get "disconnected". Finally someone answered, she couldn't find my account and she was getting my phone and name to have her supervisor to call me. Didn't happen. I called again, well it seems my delivery date is next  week! when it was supposed to be one week ago or this one the latest... So sad

name: roomirguidbird CG
text: Erica and Joey are very knowledgeable and courteous. They answered all questions and very easy to work with.

name: Kathy Turner
text: Great bunch of people and a dependable company that treats me as a valued customer, not as just an anonymous account number.

name: jgreen7536@aol.com *#Crusader2011
text: Very prompt in the delivery of my propane.  Very well within the time frame it was promised.  Always friendly.

name: Ryan Iversen
text: Missed the Leak on the Tank and wont give us credit for it leaking for months if not years.

name: John Staggs
text: On line, a few days later delivery, good friendly service. What else can I say.

name: Debra Coleman
text: They were friendly and very punctual got the job done with no problem.

name: Cantina on Wheels
text: Wow, if you want to know how NOT to answer the phone and if you don’t want new business, call this location!

name: Dirt McGurt
text: I called up there to get some information and the lady was a jerk

name: Scott Posey
text: Excellent service from an awesome AmeriGas Team.

name: Joseph Townsend
text:
When one of the guys are working there's never any propane, others working you have no problem, call to see whom is working prior to driving to the Beltline location seems one guy don't like selling propane. January 16th 2021
You will get a lecture from one young man about "Safe travel with propane tank" ( Not needed) no charge for their sour attitudes. Clay will get your propane, the others not so much.

name: Ink Guy
text: Just wonderful booked online made a 7am appointment done by 8:30 . Over and be on satisfied!!, shouting out to CLAY for taking care of it fast and efficiently. Thank you Clay and U-Haul for making my experience fast and painless , thank you all again God Bless.

name: Rodney Jones
text: Terrible interaction by their employee.  Needed to refill propane tank and pulled over to the Propane fill station and waited.  There were no other customers only the lone employee.  After waiting, I went to the office building (door standing open) to get the employees attention that I needed propane refill.  He told me to step outside and he would be with me in a minute.  So I wait out by my car.   When he finally came out he began to lecture about masks and insisted that I put one on while standing out in the parking lot.  What a joke.  CNN has brainwashed this joker.  Won’t ever be back

name: Kenzie Barnett
text: We stopped in with a last minute request on our way out of town and the manager, Clay, helped us out big time! The problem we ended up having wasn’t even on uhaul’s end and Clay still helped us fix the problem. Thank you for going above and beyond!

name: Graham Johnson
text: Fast and easy.

name: Daniel Buerger
text: Dont need a lecture about masks.  Dont need to be treated like I am 6.   Wont be back.  Keep your b.s. pandemic fears for your own phycosis.

name: Mark Childers
text: Nice how you treat retired military!

name: Mark Eriquezzo
text: So let me start by saying I am reviewing for two experiences here at this Uhaul location. The first time when I moved to this area I dropped off my UHaul equipment here and a middle aged Army Veteran greeted me and helped with the process of the return. He also helped me to figure out the area and gave me some local information which was very helpful. Now when I moved from this area I picked up my UHaul from Quality Used Automotive and I would not recommend picking up from that location but I had to unfortunately and the UHaul equipment dolly and pads were not in the truck and it was incredibly dirty. So I took the truck and drove only 4 minutes back to this initial UHaul location where I had another amazing experience. The General Manager, Clay Reed JR, met me in the store and I told him what was going on. He helped me get a dolly and pads as well as offered to clean my truck for me free of charge. His kindness, professionalism, and overall customer care is the entire reason UHaul still has my business. So to you Clay again I say THANK YOU SIR! 🙏🏻

name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service from clay employee

name: Dale Terrell
text: The manager really worked to help me, was very professional and hard working. I think his name was clay, either way I recommend them to everyone.

name: Dodd Bouchillon
text: Everyone needs to avoid doing business wit this location.  Called them to see if they had propane after the other store was out.  Woman that answered the phone stated that they did and I headed across town to their location.  When I got there, the guy behind the counter quickly told me that they could not pump any propane because their system was acting up.  Why did the woman on the phone not know this and save me a trip.  Really poor customer service.

name: David Obert
text: Don't waste your time I drove up there and the lady was too  lazy To do any work and was very rude Will be Latin everyone I can know not to do business there wasted my time

name: Mark Thomason
text: There is rarely an associate on duty who is certified to operate the propane tank filling station. I have worked next to this store for 13 years and this has been the case for a very long time. This store is apparently poorly managed because they are missing out on a lot of business just because they simply won't train their associates. It is a shame I have to drive across town when this store is so conveniently located to me.

name: Gunnar Patterson
text: Terrible place to do any business! Dont expect the same answrr twice, or anyone to ever answer the phone, they lie, and over charge, they do not know their own inventory or how things are supposed to check out. Then they call an harass you claiming you never turned the rental in and try to charge you outrageous amounts. Stay away from this location.

name: Ashlie Long
text:
Horrible customer service. Everytime I dealt with these people on the phone they were extremely rude with little to no customer service. Even on the reservation phone line, the lady I spoke with was snarky and rude.
Never booking with uhaul ever again.

name: Deborah Herron
text: Nice people!

name: J B
text: Very busy location, and understaffed.

name: Brandon Strickland
text: Nobody on staff to fill propane.

name: Brad Pike
text: This company has horrible customer service. The owner, specifically, was completely rude to me on the phone for no reason. There’s no reason to treat your customers that way.

name: Robin Pickett
text: I can’t say enough  about this great business and the wonderful employees. I’m a hospice nurse and was sent to admit a precious lady from the  Chilton county  area. She was transported via ambulance to her home after being in the hospital for 5 weeks. She just wanted to return home and be with her husband and her beloved dogs. They returned home to find they had no heat in the home. This lady was terminal and would have passed in the ambulance going back to the hospital. I reached out to Chilton propane and spoke with a true Angel her name is Sherry. Without hesitation she said we will have someone right out and knowing the situation said the bill is taken care of. Then I met Bruce who delivered the gas and checked everything out for them. This act of kindness has touched me and this family. She did pass that night but she was in her home, her precious husband and pets at her side in a warm home thanks to these beautiful people and wonderful business. I pray this business and these angels are blessed beyond measures .God bless and thanks for all you have done. To anyone reading this please use this company for your propane needs.

name: Dayton Hanson
text: My mother ordered gas but still waiting over a week to receive it. My mother has called many times and they keep saying they will be out the next day but never come. It is freaking cold and we have no heat thanks alot.

name: Lynn Wilson
text:
Bought 2 new  bottles from them 11 days ago. went back to get one filled. I was told they are not filling bottles..
I was not happy..

name: David Smith
text: I've been a customer of Chilton Propane for about 25 years now. They have always been very well to work with. Some of the friendliest most helpful folks you can find out there. I wouldn't choose anyone else for my propane needs!

name: sydney vaughn
text: Sat in parking lot for 10 mins with empty cylinders and none of workers even offered to fill them

name: Justkeep Swimming
text: Super nice people. Great customer service!

name: Karen Mickle
text: We ordered service two days ago and were told they would be here the next day. After waiting all day, NOBODY showed up to deliver propane and NOBODY called to inform us either. It's now just before noon the day AFTER we were told our delivery should have been here so we called to ask when we might expect our delivery. (Which was supposed to have been here yesterday.) We were told "The driver probably isn't going to get to you today." How on Earth is this company even in business?  It's hard to support local businesses when they are run so poorly. The basic courtesy of a phone call to inform us that our delivery was going to be late/not at all would have been helpful but apparently Chilton County Propane doesn't value our business enough to be concerned about that. Go elsewhere for your propane.

name: Laker Nation1712
text: Couldn't be more happy with this company! Extremely experienced and great pricing!

name: Kent Jones
text: They were very polite. Couldn't have asked for a better experience.

name: Shantangela Williams
text: Cheaper and they are super on customer service

name: Shane McCandless
text: They don't have dollys available and will act like it is not there problem. Had to spend 30 minutes on phone with customer service to address this issue. Tessa on the phone transferred me without even talking to me. This is absurd. I recommend trying another location or hiring a moving company....less trouble.

name: Kathryn Howard
text: We were supposed to pick up a truck from a different location, self pickup. When we got there and attempted to do it the system told us to go to the desk. That location was closed until TUESDAY!   We went to this location and Brian was able to help us get a truck in a timely fashion and was great about it. He even tried to help cancel the other reservation. Next time we need a truck I will be going to this location and hope Brian will be there again.   Thank you so much Brian.

name: C. Albert Bardi
text: Just returned a trailer that I rented for 24hrs.  I went online and bought the ball that was recommended for my suv/hitch,and a 7-to-4 wire adapter.  When I showed yesterday, the guy was friendly and helpful.  Bummer, but my suv didn’t play nice with the LED adapter I bought at auto zone or even a trailer with LED lights.  Smart dude figured it out right away though, and gave me a little older (no LED) but larger trailer at same rate that worked like a charm.  He also lent me an adapter at no charge!  A different guy helped at drop off and was super friendly.  Great all around.  One word to the wise: my pads and appliance dolly that I reserved didn’t show up on his computer at pick up, and I forgot about them (but lived without them). So if you reserve online you might want to double check that your extras are included when you pay.

name: Taylor M
text: SPARE YOURSELF and visit the location on University Drive (VERY FRIENDLY & HELPFUL). I ended up getting supplies from both locations in preparation for my move however rented a truck from the Governor's drive location. The manager and "assistant mgr" lack customer service skills and any question or request is an inconvenience to them. Upon arrival, they didn't acknowledge my existence in the store. I stood there for 5-10 minutes  while they were on the computer (no one else was in the store). Not even a simple hello, or I'll be right with you. They have no desire to help with an issue or concerns you may have. Furthermore, they put the incorrect return location on the truck which was a huge inconvenience. The University Drive location may be busy, but at least they are friendly and are willing to help.

name: Lee Anna Wright
text: Have been going here to fill up propane.  Today was met with the rudest service ever received anywhere.  After requesting service, he kept saying "I don't know what to tell you".  Ended up saying he didn't want our business.  Never again.  Hoping to contact the owner/manager next week.

name: LaNae R
text: I had a really good experience renting from this location for my out of state move. First, I reserved the wrong size truck. So I had to return to the location for a larger size. They were professional & very accommodating. After the truck was loaded, I returned to the location so they could attach my vehicle tow. Thanks for the great service!

name: Amy Hamlett
text: So disappointed. Made my appointment and paid for it. Tried to call all week, could never get an answer. Showed up for my appointment, the guy at the desk looked shock. Told me he couldn't do it. I live an hour away and took off work to get this done, they didn't even call me! The guy spoke to me like I was nothing and that I inconvenienced him by showing up. Never again going to this horrible place.

name: Jim Keel
text: Staff were deep in maskless conversation with each other while checking in, had me check myself in online. Was given the most dilapidated trailer I've ever received from U-Haul for a 17 hour interstate move. Trailer full of dirt and debris. I realized this trailer doesn't have d-rings on the floor in each corner and requested a trailer that does because the only item I'm hauling is a motorcycle (there were 5 other trailers of the same size lined up beside this one). Agent stated that this is the next trailer on the list to go out so...... I'm stuck pulling a beat trailer 17 hours with an extra hour of set up time to get the bike properly secured using the wall stakes (and hoping they don't fail). I rent from U-Haul somewhat frequently and almost always find outstanding customer service. Disappointed here though

name: Lori Diamond
text:
We had an appointment for two weeks, to have a trailer hitch put on my car. They knew we were out of town, over an hour away, and did not have the COMMON COURTESY to call and let me know that they did not have the parts. I asked when he thought he might have them, he’s response was “I’ve been waiting on something’s since December.”
Bad business!! Be professional and pick up the phone at let someone know something!

name: Bobbie
text: I had a problem with the U Haul on Drake.  I went to the main office on Governors.  They turned my day around.  Thank you guys for your diligent work fixing my problems with a smile.

name: William Lovett
text: They set an appointment for 7:15am, store doesn't open until 8am. when I call to make sure they gave me the right time, they said store is open from 7am-8pm. Then after showing up at 6:55am and waiting until 7:20am. I called and they said they don't open until 8am. Taking my money somewhere else.

name: Jeremy Owen
text: These guys are awsome. Helped me in so many ways. The guys that work behind the counter need a raise.

name: Doris Price
text: Great assistance at Huntsville AL Employee Creed gave excellent customer service.

name: Lianna Pabon
text: This uhaul business location on governor's drive has always been very helpful and I have never had any issues at all with them.  I'll continue to come back to this location as I always have and will recommend them to others also!

name: patton fussell
text:
HORRIBLE! Everything about my experience at this Uhaul location was a nightmare. I rented a trailer and upon taking it back, I shared with the representative that my truck had damage on the back side. He jumped on his phone and FaceTimed his boss while walking around the trailer to see if there was any damage. He could have cared less about my truck. Even so, he says, “no sir there’s no damage.” I had a witness riding with me that saw and heard the whole thing as well. Quickly after that I was rushed out the door to avoid any more questions about my truck. A month later, I receive a $1300 bill for damages to the trailer!!! I was stunned and figured it must have been a mistake.
Upon calling Uhaul corporate office, they told me the general manager was unaware I received a letter with charges and to be expecting a call from him. I did receive a call expecting an apology and info on what they planned on doing for my truck. Instead, he all of a sudden knew all about it(even though he wasn’t even there) and blamed me! I’ve been in a dispute for a month and it has taken so much time and it’s been awful. Do yourself a favor, and DO NOT utilize their services. You’ll regret it.

name: John Eells
text: Got a dirty truck full of leaves and such.  No biggie. The back was a bit dirty too. Mostly things that blew in from trees.  I swept it all out front and back and it was returned much cleaner than I got it.  They bothered to sneak in a $25 cleaning fee.  I’ve never earned a cleaning fee in my life. Luckily I caught it before leaving and they reversed it after about a week. If not for the attempted scam it would have been 4 or 5 stars.

name: Clint F.
text: Installed trailer hitch! They had factory installation instructions issue that took extra time to resolve. Chris credited my account back some money for the extra wait time without even asking. Great service.

name: matt barber
text: Entered the store to purchase moving supplies. No one was at counter. Made my selection while waiting for a representative to show up. About 5 minutes after being in the store with it entirely unattended I walked into the back area-found no one. Another client had since walked in to join the wait. Finally found a maintenance man outside who miraculously found 2 representatives. They never apologized about the wait time. They did not thank me for my patronage. Most importantly, anyone passerby off the street could have stolen a number of things during this entire ordeal. Horrible business practices and terrible customer service.

name: Matthew Wilson
text: I changed my previous one star review because Chris Holman took the time to fix the billing error by sitting down with me.  He impressed me with his helpfulness.  Would have rated higher but I had to take extra time to fix the problem.

name: V Lipscova
text: Came here just to buy a moving blanket or furniture cover -- the ones made out of recycled denim -- and the cashier had to count the entire cash register drawer just to take my cash payment. Very inconvenient. Not sure I'd go here again.

name: Britton Lynn
text:
When I picked up the trailer it was covered in dust and dirt on the inside. Then after I turned it back in I looked at my credit card bill and learned they charged me for $155 worth of boxes, plastic bubble wrap and all sorts of moving supplies??? I called and they told me to talk to customer service after being on the phone then they told me the GM would call me. If you want Uhaul to commit fraud and steal money from you then this is the place to go. I would HIGHLY suggest other locations.

It’s shocking that I never even signed this receipt they emailed me of stuff they charged me for and yet they are still charging me. I mean do they not have cameras to see me walking in and out of the store with no boxes????

name: regina jackson
text: Expected to have been worked with seeing as to though I left five minutes before and my address the bottom flooded and was notified as I’m driving away from the store turned around and asked to return even offered to pay the mileage and gas! But the boss has nothing for you smh

name: Carly D
text: Scheduled a pick up for tomorrow and just called to confirm my pickup. Tammy at governors informed my pickup was moved to Uncle Bobs storage on highway72 west. 1. I was not notified about the location change. 2. I live in South Huntsville. 3. Tammy hung up on me.

name: Ellen Montgomery
text: They gave us a horrible truck,  absolutely no steering!  VERY DANGEROUS! We had to drive from Huntsville, AL to Oceanside, CA!  I am not impressed at all with this company! Check your vehicles before you rent them out for an outrageous price to your customers! Horrible! We are a military family and we will be spreading the word that U-Haul is NOT the company to use or rely on! We are very open minded people,  we don't usually write negative reviews, I hope this helps future personnel and the problem is addressed. Thank you for your time and reviewing this.

name: Jonathan Pongetti
text: Employees were very helpful. No complaints.

name: Scott Chartier
text: Terrible Experience. Didn't have what I rented, staff was rude with no help given, no follow up. Go somewhere else if possible.

name: Amy Freeze
text: I needed propane for our heater tonight. The local place by me didn't have any certified to do it. I had called the s location and they could do it, but I figured I'd got to Tractor Supply and shop too.  I drove to Tractor Supply in Huntsville and THEY also didn't have anyone could do it. Got to the UHaul, not only was the guy very nice and came right out before I barely got out of the car, THEY were .50/gal cheaper then TSC! Great place.

name: Matthew Self
text: I just wanted to contact you to let you know of my experience with two different U-Haul locations in Huntsville, AL on Dec. 31, 2015.  It was such a bad experience that I will never use U-Haul again.  On Dec. 30, 2015 I reserved a pickup truck for rental the following day at the location at 3713 Governor's Drive in Huntsville.  I was scheduled to pick this vehicle up at 11:30am.  I showed up a few minutes early and the location was empty.  A few minutes later, Tammy, the General Manager comes in from the back and informs me that my reservation has been moved to the location across town at 4400 University Drive in Huntsville.  I needed to have the truck in a certain location to pick up some furniture by noon of that day and this was already placing me behind schedule considering that I was never notified in advance of this change.  A few minutes later I arrive at the location on University Drive to attempt my pick up.  While waiting in a line of 5 people, I start to become stressed because it is already 11:45am.  The General Manager at this location, Paulette Boehlke, informs me that it doesn't matter when I was scheduled to pick up this truck.  She states, that I will have to wait in line while she continues taking peoples orders and then going outside to fit them for their truck.  I am a bit in a panic because this is not what I expected considering that I had reserved the truck for a specific pick up time for a reason.  I finally left the location because I could not see it fit to pay U-Haul for the poor job they had done with having my reservation ready for pick up that morning.  All this especially considering they have a sign in office guaranteeing that they will have the truck you order at the right location at the right time available for you.  I cancelled my order with U-Haul and was able to reserve a truck with another moving company.  Tammy, from the first location called while I was on the way to pick up the new truck and tried to get me to come by and pick up a truck that was now there at her location on Governor's Drive.  She claimed that the reason I couldn't pick up the truck at the scheduled time and scheduled location was because the call center had double booked that time.  The pick up that was sitting outside her location when I was their earlier, she said, had been left by someone that had not left their keys with her.  Either way, the whole thing was crap.  I intend to never use U-Haul's services again and will inform people of this issue in the Huntsville locations.

name: B Westfall
text: Dewayne Griggs is the General Manager. Check this location out. Dewayne can handle it. Don't care how busy it is. Efficient and effective.

name: Paul F
text: Decent boxes and selection of moving supplies. But no service. No one answers the phone and I had to wait 10 minutes for the one employee to finish filling propane to check me out. Woefully understaffed.

name: ellen blasi
text: They were incredibly helpful given the fact that the customer service at Uhaul corp. messed everything up.

name: Alex Cain
text: They're good if you need something to move with, reasonable prices. Especially with their competitors.

name: Sara Elkins
text: Love the staff. Got us moved in no time.

name: Tim Rugart
text: They have always been great to me and fixed any problem I have ever Had! Customer  service was great,

name: Andrew G.
text: Worst customer service I have ever had. Moved out of Huntsville to another state, stored our ubox for awhile until my husband and I got settled. Called to get everything set up to get it shipped to us and got the run around from the store manager of all people. Had to call there corporate office multiple times to get anything done, finally after two weeks were getting our stuff. I will never use uhaul again for any reason. And I recommend to everyone on going to any other moving company then this horrible place. Would have given no stars if possible.

name: roy honey
text: The time I was there I was at the store about 2.5 for nothing the lighting wiring didn't work with my 2007 Dodge truck. All time was wasted

name: Waldwinthir Guillim
text: I rented a uhaul last Sunday. I paid 70$ for rental and boxes plus a 100$ deposit. After I returned the truck they took 96$ of my deposit. Monday I called and complained and they refunded me 34$ one day later they ran 4 unauthorized debits on my card for 330$ not happy.

name: Majesti Burroughs
text: The fellas were nice and knowledgeable

name: Coy Bailey
text: Kind of slow. Under staffed

name: Judith Allen

name: Jimmy Graves
text: Horrible service and saying there was damage and there wasn't I wish I could go under a 1
