name: TERRY GRANT
text: went in at 7 am. on Wednesday for the senior thing. there were people in the store that were not  60+. all of the employees except one were wearing masks. My biggest problem was they were out of stock on manymany items especially meat . now I have to go to another store to fill my shopping list.due to the circumstances at this time,i want to go get ALL i need and get out. I will not go back.

name: Lyn Sheehan
text: Our local Kroger is well stocked and works hard to meet customer needs. With all of our options, Kroger is our preferred store.

name: Adam Stephens
text: Shame on you Kroger. These extortionists are now charging for cash back and converting all their registers to self-checkouts. They’ve decided to swindle for additional profits while providing 0 added services (in fact, reducing services). If you value the South Huntsville community, don’t shop here - they’re eliminating local jobs and trying to extract more money from neighborhood customers. Drive the 1 mile to Publix, Target, or Walmart.

name: Samuel Hunt
text:
Great store, great people. They could update, and take some notes from Safeway. The have a fairly great organic selection of all my favorite items.

They definitely need a purified water refill station.

name: Tim Harrison
text: Stopped by to pick up a few Kroger favorites. Kroger chocolate milk.  9 grain and seed bread from the deli. Spicy seafood dip. Also a side of salmon. And a few other items.

name: Zeke H
text: A very nice store as compared to Walmart and our local Publix. I will definitely be shopping there more often.

name: Miszladii Angel
text: I love going to Kroger, they have good prices and always have clean shelves. The only thing I don't like is that they never have the chicken salad out and you have to ask for it.  But other than that... I  would recommend it.

name: Elizabeth Angelicola
text: Only pharmacy I will do to in Huntsville, Price's are low and the service is great. I can't say enough good things about them. Big enough to be of service to you but small enough to remember your name... not many places like that anymore.Keep up the great work.

name: Anita King
text: I have been going to this store for 19 years! Never, again! I was treated like a dog! I had items in my bag that was not discounted.  The clerk went back to check and it was part of the save 5. She said to go to the customer service desk and they would refund my money! I did so, the guy said I will have to check,  i said,  the girl already did, he said, i WILL CHECK....comes back and said no this was not included,  i said well the other clerk checked and she said it was, he said...ma'am you have an attitude! I said refund my money and i will never be back here again! Your employees need to be checked!

name: Ray Roland
text: Awesome store

name: Ashlynn Owen
text: I’m not the kind of person that takes the time to actually do a Google review on a store, but I have to today.  I have never been anywhere with a restroom as repulsive as the one in this Kroger. Out of the three stalls, there was one that was 100% clogged with toilet tissue, a second that had questionable fluids all over it, and a third that I had to line with tissue just so I could use it. The floors were disgusting and had a black film over them, the paper towels were soggy and left out of the dispenser, and the soap was left out of its container as well.  The trash was over-flowing onto the counter, so I had to pile my trash on top of it all. There is absolutely no excuse for anyone’s restroom to be that neglected. This experience will keep me from shopping at this store.

name: Natalie Corson
text: Best customer service ever!! Love this store.. this is where I spend my money gladly... great deals!!!

name: Ann Caves
text: A very nice employee named Jamie-who was busy working ,but took time to smile , say hello and ask if I was finding what I needed. Very nice to have kind thoughtful people take time to speak even when they are hard at work.

name: Robert Karma
text: Large Kroger with a friendly associates. This location has a pharmacy. The Deli is well stocked and I was impressed by the bakery. Kroger runs frequent sales which help me save money. The only negative is the location and tight parking lot. Still, it's a store I plan to frequent often.

name: Susan Duthie
text: This is the Kroger on S. Memorial Parkway.  I filled up two big buggies, and took 2.5 hrs to shop.  All the registers were closed because it was after 10 p.m.  The customer service mgr was excellent.  He opened up a register for me, and they checked me out and helped bag my groceries.  THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!

name: Tayler Fowler
text: Order a cake online for pickup at 10 am. Got a call saying they didnt have the kit to make the cake and my 10 am pick up was impossible due to them only having a cake decorator at 11 on Saturday. They severely need to update their website to accommodate their scheduling problems.

name: Susan Sabia
text: Kroger always has great prices and deals. Our money goes further to help feed our family. The store is always clean.The staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Mike Jones
text: The ladies in the bakery and deli are extremely rude. Especially the deli. Hateful old women.

name: Joshua Hearne
text: I love this Kroger! People are always so helpful and kind. I love their selections in food. Their offerings are a little slim on other home products, but all foods, drinks, and flowers are spot on. Their prices are a little bit higher than Walmart. They have a grocery store pickup but it costs money to use. I like Walmart's free service better and never had a problem with it

name: Rrconsign Page
text: Great deals on meats in general, but even better when they mark them down close to the sell by date.

name: Roben Carter
text: Love this store. Everything in stock. Clean. Friendly staff. I had a few questions and they were able to answer them and point me in the right direction. Love it love it love it

name: Lynn Campbell
text:
I couldn’t decide between a 3 and 4 star rating. Some of the employees are very friendly and helpful, yet some act put out that you’re there. We shop at Kroger because we actually like some of their private label items better than national brands. This Kroger is old but it’s close to us so we shop there for the convenience. I wish it could get updated so it would be a little nicer. I realize it still won’t be like the new one across town in the Madison area but some updating would help.
My main complaint (other than several unfriendly employees) is that not once have I been able to get everything I went after. They are ALWAYS out of several items on our list and the items vary. Always have to stop somewhere else on the home to complete our grocery shopping - very irritating. I can understand occasionally running out of something but this is all the time and it’s a number of items throughout the store. They could do better at keeping regular selling items in stock!

name: J A
text: Decent. I'm a vegan and I'm able to get all my shopping done. Here they have a good variety

name: s kip
text: Fresh fruit and produce good today and from USA. Lots of selection on things needed...

name: Malcolm Parsons (KI4KI)
text: Clean store. Friendly, helpful staff. Good prices and selection.

name: Lynda Claydon
text: Great deals. Friendly, efficient staff , always ready to help. NOT pretentious . Very refreshing 👍😊

name: David Rawlins
text: This is the only Kroger where the staff is friendly. Everyone we passed greeted us. Good deals greats savings.

name: Cyndi Lindblom
text: My go to place. Everyone either knows your name or recognizes you face. I have even had the store manager help me locate certain items. I love my Kroger!

name: Sarah Corradini
text: The people at this kroger are very nice. I never have problems at this store.

name: Zach G
text: Was pleasantly surprised with a reusable bag specifically designed for larger glass bottles 🍾

name: cecelia sims
text: Everyone is so friendly..from the moment you walk through the

name: Mark Ballard
text: Yet another excellent shopping experience here at Kroger. I've given up on other stores for Kroger because I always save money and the products are always good.

name: The Salty Gamer
text:
Found 18 pubes in mah rasberry pie. they were delicious. also found dead homeless man in men's handicapped bathroom stall.

(ps pubes were crunchy)

name: Brittany Hawthorne
text: I went to Kroger last week . Stopped by the seafood deli and the associates were awesome . Major and Mark, I believe they worked at night, recommended me to a new free service that I know I will definitely keep me coming back . Mark found me to hand me salmon that he prepared for me and I just appreciate him going the extra mile. Major entertained my 3 year old daughter and her friend as Mark explained to me the awesome deal I was getting. Even my cashier and bagger was fun and speedy . The only reason why I didn't give 5 stars is because of the lack of variety in poultry.

name: Mariana Faria
text: Super friendly staff. Good size supermarket with great options of items.

name: Collin Thomas
text: Always come here work next door at the car wash and the staff at this Kroger are always helpful and nice will continue to go for most of my stuff.

name: Sonya Naler
text: I picked up a prescription. The guy said it's 12.63. I said it was 10.00 last month. I showed him on good rx app on my phone. He changed it to 10.00. He said the way they filed it was the cheapest way. I guess he was wrong. He didn't apologize.

name: Elizabeth Henson
text: Awesome staff! I walked out of Kroger on S. Pkwy about an hour ago and left my $20 cash back in the machine. When I got to my destination and realized it was gone I pretty much wrote it off. Driving back by I just had to stop and ask if anyone had turned it in. The girl working the machines said "Yeah. I did."  She had seen the money, turned it in at the front desk, and they had it in the drawer in case I came back.

name: Meredith Johnson
text: Their product was not tagged correctly and they refused to honor the tagged price. In addition, it took 3 different people to determine what the price was. ImInot a fan of this store anyway. It's old, dingy and now I can add incompetent employees.

name: Morgan Ray
text: They had a great vegan and natural section but no salad bar

name: Brian Moore (Armyballer)
text: Love this place, my go-to for flowers as well.

name: The Lockhart Perspective
text:
They actually deserve a zero but they won't let you give ZERO stars so they got the ONE on the strength...
About a week ago I made a purchase... the bagger was incapable of bagging groceries... I didn't know, until I got outside to put my products in my trunk... I discovered; there, on the bottom of my basket-- all of my bread...all of my baked goods...squashed underneath 2 gallons of milk...& 3 gallons of water...I walked back into the store gave them their merchandise and got my money back.
Tonight-I gave them another chance: I went into the store ...did my shopping-went to the cash wrap and realized, I needed a little more money: It took about 2 and 1/2 minutes to walk to the car and  back.  I HANDED the gal the money and she SAT my change & reciept on the counter 😒...I pretended not to see it. Quickly making another transaction... I placed two  candy bars on the Belt - she rang them up (meanwhile,  my money is still sitting on the counter)..she rang the items up I passed her my Kroger card- she states "It's okay I've already used another one" 😕 NOW I'm totally confused!!! "I prefer to use my own- I like to get my fuel points." She huffed,  cancelled the sale and re-rang it With an attitude--
ALABAMA!!!-- You win!!
I have not seen such deep-seated hate in many, many years! I will not be back!
I'm taking my money someplace else! (With your high priced, SPOILED meat, havin-selves!)

name: Matt Rigney
text: Store is large.  Almost too large. I often find it difficult to find items here. Additionally, the ambience is a little drab. However, I have found a couple things here that I haven't been able to anywhere else (tomatillos being the most recent example).

name: Lora King
text: Excellent staff. Always a good selection of ice cream flavors and frozen juices. Meat selections good. But produce section always half rotten.

name: Hannah Ungerecht
text: Horrible produce

name: Patricia Taylor
text: This is my favorite Kroger.  The people are very helpful and always nice. I find great deals, too.

name: Kathleen Walsh
text: Always friendly, helpful staff...I love that they employ people who have challenges.  This store has limited stock, but great sales!

name: Luis Susan
text: I came here at 8:30 pm mu car broken the tire so but they tell me mpve the car i say i came store my the mik for my son then i came back quick but when i came back they give me ticket 50$ ...? I never came back this store bad to bad

name: Kellie Andrews
text: So happy that Kroger is located here. Have been getting prescriptions here for years, and it is our go-to grocery store on the way to and from work. Great people, great selection!

name: Scout 1000
text: Where is the So Delicious products?!  They have the best coconut milk and I can never find it anymore.  Has Kroger stopped selling it?  There have been quite a few times when I've found a product I really like and then out of the blue, the store stops selling it.  It's aggravating!

name: Ryan R

name: Paul Huggins

Your store keeps us in gluten-free products and my wife really appreciates it
Thanks

name: Elizabeth Pate
text:
This is one of the older Krogers in town, and it shows. Cracks in the floors, etc. But, the food selection is nice and prices are reasonable. Being one of the older Krogers is nice because not many people shop here, meaning you get top choice of markdowns.

They play some of the worst music ever, though.
